title: Do you have to finish a game to love it? [The Resties]
description: Do you have to finish a game to fully appreciate it? This week, The Resties discuss the huge time investment of our favorite hobby, and decide how much of a game is enough. In the back half, Plante and Frushtick use a fancy new mod for the original Doom to discuss ray tracing. Learn why the "big thing" in video game graphics still may be years from matter to most players.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Russ Frushtick, Chris Plante, The Resties)
